resources.string: With this app you can open YouTube videos as an immobile popup in the middle of the screen that is closed automatically when the video ends, or can be closed with a single click on the back button.

"App created by TrianguloY.
Notice: This app is not affiliated with YouTube nor Google. This is a third party app that uses the YouTube Api and doesn't replace any of the YouTube features."
This app is currently not shown when opening Youtube Links.
The current Android setting is set to open YouTube links with the app: \'%s\'.

"
To be able to open as preview you must set this app as the default by following this instructions: 1) Press the button to open the Android Settings. 2) Go to 'Open by default' (you may need to press on 'Advanced' first) 3) Select 'Open supported links'->'Open in this app' (even though it is called that, you will be asked which app you prefer to set as the default) If 'Open in this app' is already selected, select other option and then that one (otherwise the change isn't applied)"
Choose in which app videos will be opened, in case you have multiple YouTube variants.
Display videos in landscape fullscreen, instead of windowed portrait/landscape.
Everything is ready! Here is an example video: Click the link to test the app and the settings (the video is just the default Youtube logo).
